blogPost.excerpt: Anyone can have great ideas, but not everyone is a designer! Powered by AI, Uizard empowers anyone to easily design interactive web & mobile apps. 🛠 rapid prototyping, 🧠 brainstorming and ideation workshops, ✍️ design sprints, 👔 pitching clients, & more.
blogPost.body: Anyone can have great ideas, but not everyone is a designer! Powered by AI, Uizard empowers anyone to easily design interactive web & mobile apps. 🛠 rapid prototyping, 🧠 brainstorming and ideation workshops, ✍️ design sprints, 👔 pitching clients, & more.
blogPost.title: Uizard - The design tool for everyone, powered by AI
blogPost.author: Thomas Schranz ⛄️

localize.description: 任何人都可以有伟大的想法，但不是每个人都是设计师! 在人工智能的支持下，Uizard使任何人都能轻松设计交互式网络和移动应用。🛠快速原型设计、🧠头脑风暴和构思研讨会、✍️设计冲刺、👔推销客户等。
localize.tagline: 每个人的设计工具，由AI驱动

localize.description: 任何人都可以有偉大的想法，但不是每個人都是設計師! 在人工智能的支持下，Uizard使任何人都能輕鬆設計交互式網絡和移動應用。🛠快速原型設計、🧠頭腦風暴和構思研討會、✍️設計衝刺、👔推銷客戶等。
localize.tagline: 每個人的設計工具，由AI驅動

previous.excerpt: 👋 FavEmojis.com is a website that allows you to save Emojis as favorites to have them always handy. Find the Emojis you need and just click to copy and paste them wherever you needed. For example to easy create ads, texts, designs.
previous.title: 👋 FavEmoji – Copy & Paste Emojis - Save Emojis as favorites. Perfect to create ads/text/design.

localize.description: 👋 FavEmojis.com是一个网站，允许你保存表情符号作为收藏夹，让他们总是方便。找到你需要的Emojis，只需点击复制和粘贴到你需要的地方。例如轻松创建广告、文本、设计。
localize.tagline: 将表情符号保存为收藏夹。完美的创建广告/文本/设计。

localize.description: 👋 FavEmojis.com是一個網站，允許你保存表情符號作爲收藏夾，讓他們總是方便。找到你需要的Emojis，只需點擊複製和粘貼到你需要的地方。例如輕鬆創建廣告、文本、設計。
localize.tagline: 將表情符號保存爲收藏夾。完美的創建廣告/文本/設計。

next.excerpt: https://ponicode.com/product-hunt is an essential AI-powered tool to produce professional and clean code ✅ Let the AI take care of unit testing in all your JavasScript or Python functions. Thanks to our little pony 🦄 save time, energy and focus on what truly matters in your code 😎
next.title: Ponicode Unit Test - AI-powered unicorn for unit testing

localize.description: https://ponicode.com/product-hunt 是一个必不可少的人工智能驱动的工具，可以生成专业而干净的代码✅ 让人工智能来负责你所有 JavasScript 或 Python 函数的单元测试。多亏了我们的小马驹🦄，节省了时间和精力，并专注于代码中真正重要的东西😎。
localize.tagline: 用于单元测试的AI动力独角兽。

localize.description: https://ponicode.com/product-hunt 是一個必不可少的人工智能驅動的工具，可以生成專業而乾淨的代碼✅ 讓人工智能來負責你所有 JavasScript 或 Python 函數的單元測試。多虧了我們的小馬駒🦄，節省了時間和精力，並專注於代碼中真正重要的東西😎。
localize.tagline: 用於單元測試的AI動力獨角獸。
